501.tips: Supply Line Disruption is open every day, and can be played a maximum of 2 times weekly.
501.title: Supply Line Disruption
501.des: Launch an operation to disrupt enemy supply lines with your Submarine Fleet! Success will grant you various Submarine gear blueprints!

201.tips: Escort Mission available on every Monday, Thursday and Sunday
201.title: 商船护送
201.des: Our Cargo ship is damaged by enemy torpedoes! Escort it to get a large number of Equipment Materials

301.tips: Advance Mission available on every Tuesday, Friday and Sunday
301.title: 海域突进
301.des: Enemy self-destruction boats are zerging around! Clear them will have a chance to get Tactical Materials

401.tips: Fierce Assault available on every Wednesday, Saturday and Sunday
401.title: 斩首行动
401.des: Warning! Enemy Bosses on sight! Destroy them will have a chance to get Mystery Tech Packs

601.title: 战术研修
601.des: 强大的特战敌人出现了！击破有几率获得战术升级材料
